column1: I decided to open the curtain and show you how I am doing the back side of my brooches. First
And here I want to tell more. In my works I use high-quality new materials. But as for the use of plastic - here I play the role of a processing plantüòÅ üöÆ‚ôªÔ∏èüíé

I select flat plastic blanks that suit me by characteristics (some flexibility and thickness is needed) - these can be covers from various plastic boxes that we use in everyday life. I wash them carefully
column3: give them the desired shape and thus give a new life in a beautiful new guise.

column1: And here I am not ashamed to admit that I use recycled materials
column2: because in this way I am at least a little benefiting this world
